title: The Strategy to Become Good at Magic - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Age Regression   Alchemy   Child Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Crafting   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Level System   Loli   Magic   Overpowered Protagonist   Pets   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Shameless Protagonist   Transported into a Game World

description: Sue Lin the protagonist gets teleported to the online gaming world she’s playing in, reverting back to 4 years old. Watch her cause mayhem in that world!>
